text: Allahâ€Œ upama dicchena [1] an'yera adhikarabhukta eka dasera, ye kono kichura upara sakti rakhe na ebam emana eka byaktira yake amara amara paksa theke uttama riyaka dana karechi ebam se ta theke gopane o prakasye byaya kare; tara ki eke an'yera samana [2]?
